mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, EMP_REGNO AS empRegno, EMP_NAME AS empName, EMP_ENABLE AS empEnable, EMP_GUBUN AS empGubun, CORP_GUBUN AS corpGubun, DIGITAL_SEAL_URL AS digitalSealUrl, DIGITAL_SIGN_URL AS digitalSignUrl FROM ATMS_AGENT_MNG

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, EMP_REGNO AS empRegno, EMP_NAME AS empName, EMP_ENABLE AS empEnable, EMP_GUBUN AS empGubun, CORP_GUBUN AS corpGubun, DIGITAL_SEAL_URL AS digitalSealUrl, DIGITAL_SIGN_URL AS digitalSignUrl FROM ATMS_AGENT_MNG WHERE EMP_REGNO = #{empRegno}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_AGENT_MNG SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_ENABLE = #{empEnable}, EMP_GUBUN = #{empGubun}, CORP_GUBUN = #{corpGubun}, DIGITAL_SEAL_URL = #{digitalSealUrl}, DIGITAL_SIGN_URL = #{digitalSignUrl} WHERE EMP_REGNO = #{empRegno}

INSERT INTO ATMS_AGENT_MNG ( JISA_CODE, EMP_REGNO, EMP_NAME, EMP_ENABLE, EMP_GUBUN, CORP_GUBUN, DIGITAL_SEAL_URL, DIGITAL_SIGN_URL ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{empRegno}, #{empName}, #{empEnable}, #{empGubun}, #{corpGubun}, #{digitalSealUrl}, #{digitalSignUrl} )
